title: UPDATE 1-Blackstone to buy BioMed Realty for $8 bln
text:
Published By: Reuters - Company News - Today 
Oct 8 (Reuters) - Healthcare REIT BioMed Realty Trust Inc said it had agreed to be bought by Blackstone Group LP in a deal valued at $8 bill...
